Subject: RE: 00436735 - Destination Details field is empty even if the DPI is turned ON

Hello Danylo,

I wanted to check in regarding your support ticket 00436735. We haven’t heard from you in a while, and I just wanted to see if you still need assistance with this issue.

If you’re still experiencing problems or have any updates to share, please let me know. If the issue has been resolved, I can go ahead and close the ticket on my end.

Please feel free to reply to this email with any updates or questions. We’re here to help you get the most out of your Netwrix products.

Ticket Number: 00436735
Ticket Subject: Destination Details field is empty even if the DPI is turned ON
Ticket Details: Hello,

Customer name is PrivatBank.
They have encountered the issue when the Destination Details field is empty even if the DPI is turned ON.
The EPP client is Ubuntu 24.04 version 2.4.4.1. When the CAP policy is triggered, the Destination Details field in the Reports and Analysis menu is empty.
Could you please clarify what could cause this issue?
Attaching screenshots.

Thank you!

Botond Biro
